name.jp: ジャイアントモンスター召喚のオーブ(D)

description.en: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.br: Pode invocar os Gigantes: Nautrepy, Syilaca, Greemong, ou Boo em algum lugar próximo. Para usar, clique duas vezes no item e depois selecione uma área no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能够召唤出蛙跳蝠、食人鱼、绿泥怪、花兽其中之一的水晶球。
description.de: Ein Giant Nautrepy, Giant Syliaca, Giant Greemong oder Giant Boo werden in deiner Nähe beschworen.
description.fi: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un des géants suivants : Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong ou Boo. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Akan memanggil Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, atau Boo di dekatnya. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ノートレー、シーラカ、グリーモン、ブウの中でどれか1匹のジャイアントモンスターを召喚するオーブ。使用してから召喚する地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 너트레피, 시일라카, 그리몽, 부우 중 한 종류의 거대 몬스터를 소환 하는 구슬
description.nl: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.sp: Invoca a uno de los siguientes Gigantes: Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong o Boo. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Will summon a Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong, or Boo nearby. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground to summon the Giant.
description.th: จะเรียก Giant Nautrepy, Syliaca, Greemong หรือ Boo มาใกล้ๆ ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่บนพื้นเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能夠召喚出愛美酷帥鼠、得肯湖傳說、好大一陀史萊膿、終極魔花獸其中之一的晶球。要使用，請點擊它兩下，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Sẽ triệu hồi một Nautrepy Khổng lồ, Syliaca, Greemong hoặc Boo ở gần đó. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
